OVERLAY_FULL_NAME: Land Subject to Inundation Overlay - Schedule 1

PURPOSE_SUMMARY: Protect vegetation; control removal and lopping.
INDIGENOUS_TREES_PROTECTED: Yes (native vegetation provisions via Clause 52.17 may also apply)
PRUNING_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Yes (lopping/works may require permit – check schedule)
REMOVAL_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Yes (removal/destroy/lop vegetation typically requires permit)
EXEMPTION_EMERGENCY: See Planning Scheme general/Clause 52.17 exemptions; also 52.12 for bushfire
EXEMPTION_FIRE_PREVENTION_10M: Yes, where 52.12 Bushfire Protection exemptions apply
OFFSET_REQUIRED: Often for native vegetation under 52.17 Guidelines
COUNCIL_REFERRAL: As specified by schedule (may include internal env/heritage)
DELWP_REFERRAL: As specified by schedule / Clause 66 referrals

PURPOSE_SUMMARY: Protect significant landscape character and vegetation.
INDIGENOUS_TREES_PROTECTED: Yes (native vegetation provisions via Clause 52.17 may also apply)
PRUNING_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Often (where schedule specifies)
REMOVAL_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Often (where schedule specifies removal/lopping controls)
EXEMPTION_EMERGENCY: See Planning Scheme general/Clause 52.17 exemptions; also 52.12 for bushfire
EXEMPTION_FIRE_PREVENTION_10M: Yes, where 52.12 Bushfire Protection exemptions apply
OFFSET_REQUIRED: Often for native vegetation under 52.17 Guidelines
COUNCIL_REFERRAL: As specified by schedule (may include internal env/heritage)
DELWP_REFERRAL: As specified by schedule / Clause 66 referrals

PURPOSE_SUMMARY: Protect environmental values; regulate vegetation removal.
INDIGENOUS_TREES_PROTECTED: Yes (native vegetation provisions via Clause 52.17 may also apply)
PRUNING_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Yes (where schedule requires)
REMOVAL_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Yes (remove/destroy/lop vegetation generally requires permit)
EXEMPTION_EMERGENCY: See Planning Scheme general/Clause 52.17 exemptions; also 52.12 for bushfire
EXEMPTION_FIRE_PREVENTION_10M: Yes, where 52.12 Bushfire Protection exemptions apply
OFFSET_REQUIRED: Often for native vegetation under 52.17 Guidelines
COUNCIL_REFERRAL: As specified by schedule (may include internal env/heritage)
DELWP_REFERRAL: As specified by schedule / Clause 66 referrals

OVERLAY_FULL_NAME: Heritage Overlay (Clause 43.01) – trees only where 'Tree controls apply'
PURPOSE_SUMMARY: Conserve heritage; tree controls only if schedule applies.
INDIGENOUS_TREES_PROTECTED: Yes (native vegetation provisions via Clause 52.17 may also apply)
PRUNING_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Only if schedule says 'Tree controls apply'
REMOVAL_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Only if schedule says 'Tree controls apply'
EXEMPTION_EMERGENCY: See Planning Scheme general/Clause 52.17 exemptions; also 52.12 for bushfire
EXEMPTION_FIRE_PREVENTION_10M: Yes, where 52.12 Bushfire Protection exemptions apply
OFFSET_REQUIRED: Often for native vegetation under 52.17 Guidelines
COUNCIL_REFERRAL: As specified by schedule (may include internal env/heritage)
DELWP_REFERRAL: As specified by schedule / Clause 66 referrals

OVERLAY_FULL_NAME: Bushfire Management Overlay (Clause 44.06) – interacts with vegetation exemptions
PURPOSE_SUMMARY: Manage bushfire risk; vegetation exemptions under Clause 52.12.
INDIGENOUS_TREES_PROTECTED: Yes (native vegetation provisions via Clause 52.17 may also apply)
PRUNING_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Not by BMO itself; see 52.12 exemptions and 52.17
PRUNING_THRESHOLD_DESCRIPTION: 52.12 provides defendable space exemptions (e.g., 10/30, 10/50 where applicable)
REMOVAL_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Not by BMO itself; vegetation clearance may be exempt under 52.12 or require 52.17 permit
EXEMPTION_EMERGENCY: See Planning Scheme general/Clause 52.17 exemptions; also 52.12 for bushfire
EXEMPTION_FIRE_PREVENTION_10M: Yes, where 52.12 Bushfire Protection exemptions apply
OFFSET_REQUIRED: Often for native vegetation under 52.17 Guidelines
COUNCIL_REFERRAL: As specified by schedule (may include internal env/heritage)
DELWP_REFERRAL: As specified by schedule / Clause 66 referrals

PURPOSE_SUMMARY: State control on removing native vegetation; exemptions and offsets apply.
INDIGENOUS_TREES_PROTECTED: Yes (native vegetation provisions via Clause 52.17 may also apply)
PRUNING_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Yes, where native vegetation removal/lopping is proposed (unless exempt)
PRUNING_THRESHOLD_DESCRIPTION: See Environment Vic guidance on exemptions
REMOVAL_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Yes (unless exempt or listed in schedule to 52.17)
EXEMPTION_EMERGENCY: See Planning Scheme general/Clause 52.17 exemptions; also 52.12 for bushfire
EXEMPTION_FIRE_PREVENTION_10M: Yes, where 52.12 Bushfire Protection exemptions apply
OFFSET_REQUIRED: Often for native vegetation under 52.17 Guidelines
COUNCIL_REFERRAL: As specified by schedule (may include internal env/heritage)
DELWP_REFERRAL: As specified by schedule / Clause 66 referrals

PURPOSE_SUMMARY: Protect significant landscape character and vegetation.
INDIGENOUS_TREES_PROTECTED: Yes (if native vegetation; Clause 52.17 may also apply)
PRUNING_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Yes
PRUNING_THRESHOLD_DESCRIPTION: Pruning resulting in loss of >=10% canopy requires a planning permit (council guidance)
REMOVAL_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Yes (remove/lop typically requires permit under SLO)
EXEMPTION_EMERGENCY: Per overlay schedule; 52.17 and 52.12 may exempt

OVERLAY_FULL_NAME: Heritage Overlay – tree controls apply only where specified (Yarra)
PURPOSE_SUMMARY: Conserve heritage; tree controls only if schedule applies.
INDIGENOUS_TREES_PROTECTED: Yes (if native vegetation; Clause 52.17 may also apply)
PRUNING_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Where schedule says 'Tree controls apply'
PRUNING_THRESHOLD_DESCRIPTION: HO tree controls only if ticked in schedule; otherwise zone/local controls apply
REMOVAL_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Where schedule says 'Tree controls apply'
EXEMPTION_EMERGENCY: Per overlay schedule; 52.17 and 52.12 may exempt
OTHER_EXEMPTIONS: General Yarra vegetation guidance lists zone-based thresholds; overlay may override

PURPOSE_SUMMARY: Protect environmental values; regulate vegetation removal.
INDIGENOUS_TREES_PROTECTED: Yes (if native vegetation; Clause 52.17 may also apply)
PRUNING_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Yes (where schedule requires)
PRUNING_THRESHOLD_DESCRIPTION: Schedule identifies significant trees/areas; permit required to remove/destroy/lop
REMOVAL_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Yes (per ESO4 schedule)
EXEMPTION_EMERGENCY: Per overlay schedule; 52.17 and 52.12 may exempt

PURPOSE_SUMMARY: Protect vegetation; control removal and lopping.
INDIGENOUS_TREES_PROTECTED: Yes (if native vegetation; Clause 52.17 may also apply)
PRUNING_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Yes (where schedule requires)
REMOVAL_PERMIT_REQUIRED: Yes (lopping/removal requires permit under VPO3)
EXEMPTION_EMERGENCY: Per overlay schedule; 52.17 and 52.12 may exempt
NOTES: Bayside permit guide lists VPO3 covering Black Rock, Beaumaris and parts of Cheltenham; native species focus.

EXEMPTION_EMERGENCY: Per overlay schedule; 52.17 and 52.12 may exempt
